body:
Comment 12: 
I think the main outcome of discussion here was that we should have 1 package or program
per directory.

github.com/mattn/go-xmpp: mattn changed it. Example program is in a separate from
package directory now.

$GOROOT/misc/cgo/life: still contains both life package and main program. We have
decided against the split until we have "go" program that will allow us to build these
without Makefiles.

I am happy to rename this into "$GOROOT/misc/cgo/life: split source files for package
and main program into separate directories to comply with go build rules". But, I think,
it is given once we change our build process.

Alex
